Wagner Labor ArchiveElmer Holmes Bobst Library70 Washington Square South10th FloorNew York, NY 10012(212) 998-2630tamiment.wagner@nyu.eduThis finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2018-07-30T19:08:02Describing Archives: A Content Standard
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Mark Rosenthal Papers
Rosenthal, Mark
Rosenthal, Mark
WAG.289
0.25 Linear Feet (1 boxes)
undated This small collection contains the collected papers of Mark Rosenthal regarding AFSCME, District Council 37, Local 983. The collection includes clippings, newsletters, election materials, and a discrimination complaint by Rosenthal against the union.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Mark Rosenthal, 2008. The accession number associated with this gift is 2008.035.
Scope and Contents
This small collection contains the collected papers of Mark Rosenthal regarding AFSCME, District Council 37, Local 983. The collection includes clippings, newsletters, election materials, and a discrimination complaint by Rosenthal against the union.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection, created by Mark Rosenthal was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Mark Rosenthal Papers; WAG 289; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Rosenthal, Mark
